{{also|По|ПО|по-|Appendix:Variations of "po"}}
==Bulgarian==

===Pronunciation 1===
{{rfc-pron-n|Pronunciation 1|lang=bg}}
* {{qualifier|unstressed}} {{IPA|/po/|lang=bg}}

====Preposition====
{{head|bg|preposition|tr=po|sc=Cyrl}}

# {{non-gloss definition|used to indicate movement over a surface or movement bound to certain limits (usually continuous or repeating in time)}}, [[on#Preposition|on]], [[over#Preposition|over]], [[through#Preposition|through]], [[along#Preposition|along]]
#: {{ux|bg|Вървя '''по''' улицата.|t=I am walking '''on''' the street.|inline=1}}
# {{non-gloss definition|introducing the object of a targeted action or for an action related to certain state}}, [[on#Preposition|on]], [[over#Preposition|over]], [[for#Preposition|for]]
#: {{ux|bg|Потупaх го '''по''' рамото.|t=I tapped him '''on''' the shoulder.|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|bg|Ударих го '''по''' главата.|t=I hit him '''on'''/'''over''' the head.|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|bg|Тъгувам '''по''' лятото.|t=I long '''for''' the summer.|inline=1}}
# {{non-gloss definition|in conjunction with countable nouns for price or quantity, expressing quantity, expressing distribution}}, [[by#Preposition|by]]
#: {{ux|bg|'''По''' евро за книга.|t=A euro for a book.|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|bg|Двама '''по''' двама.|t=Two '''by''' two.|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|bg|Тичам '''по''' малко (всеки ден).|t=I am running a little (every day).|inline=1}}
# {{non-gloss definition|expressing approximate time}}
#: {{ux|bg|'''По''' обед.|t='''Around''' lunchtime.|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|bg|'''По''' Коледа.|t='''Around''' Christmas.|inline=1}}
# {{non-gloss definition|used to describe attire}}, [[with#Preposition|with]] ... [[on#Preposition|on]]
#: {{ux|bg|Ходя '''по''' чорапи.|t=I am walking '''with''' my socks '''on'''.|inline=1}}
# {{non-gloss definition|used to indicate means}}, [[by#Preposition|by]], [[via#Preposition|via]], [[on#Preposition|on]]
#: {{ux|bg|Пращам го '''по''' автобус.|t=I am sending it '''by''' bus.|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|bg|Пращам го '''по''' въздушна поща.|t=I am sending it '''via''' airmail.|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|bg|Говоря '''по''' телефона.|t=I am talking '''on''' the phone.|inline=1}}
# {{non-gloss definition|indicating an activity or it's domain}}, [[of#Preposition|of]]
#: {{ux|bg|Учител '''по''' история.|t=History teacher.|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|bg|Факултет '''по''' физика.|t=Faculty '''of''' physics.|inline=1}}
# {{non-gloss definition|according to, based on}}, [[by#Preposition|by]], [[of#Preposition|of]]
#: {{ux|bg|Съдя го '''по''' външността му.|t=I am judging him '''by''' his appearance.|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|bg|Работя '''по''' усмотрение.|t=I work '''of''' my own accord.|inline=1}}
# {{non-gloss definition|used to indicate cause}}, [[by#Preposition|by]]
#: {{ux|bg|Пропуснато е '''по''' погрешка.|t=It is missed '''by''' mistake.|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|bg|'''По''' негова вина закъснях.|t=It is his fault I was late.|inline=1}}
# {{non-gloss definition|used to indicate direction}}, [[along#Preposition|along]]
#: {{ux|bg|Плувам '''по''' течението.|t=I am swimming '''along''' the current.|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|bg|Ходя '''по''' пътеката.|t=I am walking '''along''' the path.|inline=1}}

===Pronunciation 2===
* {{qualifier|stressed}} {{IPA|/pɔ/|lang=bg}}

====Particle====
{{head|bg|prefix|tr=po|sc=Cyrl}}

# {{non-gloss definition|used as a prefix to form comparative for adjectives and adverbs}}, [[more]]
#: {{ux|bg|Корабите са '''по-бавни''' от самолетите.|t=Ships are '''slower''' than airplanes.|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|bg|Този филм е '''по-интересен'''.|t=This film is '''more interesting'''.|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|bg|Трябва да ходя '''по-бързо'''.|t=I should walk '''faster'''.|inline=1}}

{{head|bg|particle|head=пò|tr=pó|sc=Cyrl}}
# {{non-gloss definition|used for nouns, verbs and other parts of speech to form a comparative}}, [[more]]
#: {{ux|bg|'''Пò''' я обичам!|t=I love her '''more'''!|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|bg|Той е '''пò''' юнак от теб.|t=He is '''more of''' a hero than you.|inline=1}}
# {{non-gloss definition|used before prepositions to form a comparative}}, [[more]]
#: {{ux|bg|Областта е '''пò''' на север.|t=The region is '''more''' northwards.|inline=1}}

===See also===
* {{l|bg|повече}}

==Macedonian==

===Preposition===
{{head|mk|preposition}}

# [[after]]
#: ''Ќе се вратат по вечерата.''
#:: ''They'll return after dinner.''
# [[on]] (movement along a surface)
#: ''Одам по улицата.''
#:: ''I'm walking on the street.''
# [[by]] (distributive)
#: ''Влезете еден по еден.''
#:: ''Enter one by one.''
# [[times]]
#: ''Два по два е четири.''
#:: ''Two times two is four.''
# {{lb|mk|colloquial}} [[according to]]
#: ''По тебе, што ќе се случи следно?''
#:: ''According to you, what's going to happen next?''

==Russian==

===Etymology===
From {{inh|ru|sla-pro|*po}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{ru-IPA}}
* {{ru-IPA|по́}} {{i|when stressed}}
* {{audio|Ru-по.ogg|Audio|lang=ru}}

===Preposition===
{{head|ru|preposition}}

# {{non-gloss definition|with [[accusative case]]}}
## [[up to]]
## [[till]]
## {{non-gloss definition|indicates distribution (with numerals other than one, a thousand, a million, a billion, a trillion, etc. and compound numerals ending these words)}}
##: {{uxi|ru|по́ [[два|два (две)]] / по [[две́сти]]|t=two / two hundred each}}
# {{non-gloss definition|with [[dative case]]}}
## [[along]]
## [[over]]
## [[on]]
##: {{uxi|ru|[[плыть]] по [[реке́]]|t=to swim on a river}}
## [[according to]]
## {{non-gloss definition|showing the cause that is unwanting or unwilling}} (see [[из-за]]'s usage notes for more detail)
## {{non-gloss definition|indicates the [[direct object]] of some verbs of striking or hitting}}
##: {{uxi|ru|[[нанести́]] [[уда́р]] по [[ядерный|я́дерным]] [[объект|объе́ктам]] [[Иран|Ира́на]]|t=to launch a strike at Iran's nuclear ambitions}}
## {{non-gloss definition|indicates repetition of time}}
## {{non-gloss definition|indicates distribution (with numerals one, a thousand, a million, a billion, a trillion, etc. and compound numerals ending in these words)}}
##: {{uxi|ru|по [[один|одному́ (одно́й)]] / по [[тысяча|ты́сяче]] / по [[миллион|миллио́ну]] / по [[миллиард|миллиа́рду]]|t=one / a thousand / a million / a billion each}}
# {{non-gloss definition|with [[prepositional case]]}}
## [[after]]
## [[for]]

====Usage notes====
* When used with numerals in a distributive sense, the following should be noted:
** The case of the numeral is the dative for the numerals one, a thousand, a million, a billion, a trillion, etc. and compound numerals ending in these words, e.g. twenty-one, but the accusative inanimate (even with animate nouns) for the remainder.
**: {{uxi|ru|[[я|Я]] [[дать|дал]] [[они|им]] '''по [[пя́ть]]''' [[рубль|рубле́й]].|I gave them '''five''' rubles '''each'''.}}
**: {{uxi|ru|[[я|Я]] [[дать|дал]] [[они|им]] '''по [[двадцать один|двадцати́ одному́]]''' [[рубль|рублю́]].|I gave them '''twenty-one''' rubles '''each'''.}}
**: {{uxi|ru|[[мы|Мы]] [[отправить|отпра́вили]] '''по [[три́]]''' [[человек|челове́ка]].|We sent '''three''' men '''each'''.|source=note, not animate '''*трёх'''}}
** The case of an associated noun, if any, follows the normal rules for the numeral (dative singular for one and compounds ending in one; genitive singular for two, three, four and compounds ending in these numerals; and genitive plural in all other cases).
** With {{m|ru|два}}, {{m|ru|три}}, {{m|ru|сто}} (but not compounds ending in these numerals), the stress is optionally drawn onto '''по''':
**: {{uxi|ru|[[я|Я]] [[дать|дал]] [[они|им]] '''по́ [[два]]'''/'''по [[два́]]''' [[рубль|рубля́]].|I gave them '''two''' rubles '''each'''.}}

====Related terms====
* {{l|ru|по ме́ре того́ как}}

==Serbo-Croatian==

===Etymology 1===
From {{m|sh|sc=Cyrl|пол}}, from {{etyl|sla-pro|sh}} {{m|sla-pro|*polъ}}. See {{m|sh|sc=Cyrl|по-}}.

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|sh|sc=Cyrl|по̑л}}

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|/pôː/|lang=sh}}

====Adverb====
{{sh-adverb|head=по̑}}

# [[half]]
#: {{ux|sh|сат и '''по'''|t=hour and a half|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|четири и '''по'''|t=four thirty|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|чов(ј)ек и '''по'''|t=an excellent man|inline=1}}

===Etymology 2===
From {{inh|sh|sla-pro|*po}}, from {{etyl|ine-pro|sh}} {{m|ine-pro|*h₂(e)po}}.

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|/pô/|lang=sh}}

====Preposition====
{{sh-preposition|head=по̏}}

# {{qualifier|+ [[accusative case]]}} [[for]]
#: {{ux|sh|отићи '''по''' мл(иј)еко|t=to go and get the milk|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' ц(иј)ели дан|t=all day long|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' шести пут|t=for the sixth time|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|бити штетан '''по''' некога/нешто|t=to be harmful for sb/sth|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|добро/лоше '''по''' њега|t=good/bad for him|inline=1}}
# {{qualifier|+ [[locative case]]}} [[over]], [[through]], [[across]], [[in]], [[on]]
#: {{ux|sh|ударити '''по''' глави|t=to hit on the head|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|сн(иј)ег је пао '''по''' цести|t=snow fell on the road|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|вода се пролила '''по''' поду|t=water spilled over the floor|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|шетати '''по''' шуми|t=to walk in the woods|inline=1}}
# {{qualifier|+ [[locative case]]}} [[by]], [[with]], [[through]] (using an intermediary or medium)
#: {{ux|sh|Послао сам му пакет '''по''' заједничком пријатељу.|t=I've sent him a package via a mutual friend.|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' зраку/води|t=by air/water|inline=1}}
# {{qualifier|+ [[locative case]]}} [[by]], [[according to]]
#: {{ux|sh|све иде '''по''' плану|t=everything is going according to the plan|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|Америка је прва држава '''по''' богатству у св(иј)ету.|t=America is the richest country in the world.|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' глави становника|t=per capita|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|жив(ј)ети '''по''' принципима|t=to live according to principles|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' мом(е) мишљењу|t=in my opinion|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' мом рачуну|t=by my reckoning|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' мени|t=in my opinion; as far as I'm concerned|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|свирати '''по''' слуху|t=to play by ear|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|судити '''по''' вањштини|t=to judge by appearance|inline=1}}
# {{qualifier|+ [[locative case]]}} [[after]]
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' свршетку сукоба|t=after (the end of) the conflict|inline=1}}
# {{qualifier|+ [[locative case]]}} [[during]]
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' киши/сунцу|t=in the rain/sun|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' дану|t=during the day|inline=1}}
# {{qualifier|+ [[locative case]]}} in miscellaneous senses in various phrasal constructs
#: {{ux|sh|разум(иј)е се (само) '''по''' себи|t=it goes without saying|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|нека буде '''по''' твоме|t=let it be your way|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|једнак '''по''' величини|t=equal in size|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|све је '''по''' старом|t=everything is/goes in the accustomed/usual manner|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' обичају|t=as usual, according to custom|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' вр(иј)едности|t=in value|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' свој прилици|t=in all likelihood|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' роду|t=by birth|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' нарави/природи|t=in nature|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' тој ц(иј)ени|t=at this price|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' параграфу 13|t=under section 13|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' што '''по''' то|t=by all means|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' могућности|t=if possible|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' реду|t=in order, one after another|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' мом укусу|t=(according) to my taste|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' квалитети|t=by quality|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' томе|t=according to this/that, accordingly, consequently, then|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' закону|t=according to the law, by the law|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|'''по''' дуљини|t=lengthwise|inline=1}}

===Etymology 3===

====Particle====
{{sh-particle}}

# {{qualifier|+ [[accusative case]] or [[nominative case]]}} ''denoting [[distribution]] and [[succession]]''; [[by]], [[per]], [[each]], [[apiece]]
#: {{ux|sh|Попили смо сви '''по''' чашицу ракије.|t=We all drank a glass of rakija each.|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|корак '''по''' корак|t=step by step|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|један '''по''' један|t=one by one|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|трипут '''по''' сату|t=three times per hour|inline=1}}
#: {{ux|sh|Cви смо добили '''по''' јабуку.|t=Each of us received an apple.|inline=1}}
